name: School Thief
description:
In this game you play as a thief who wants to steal a school Principal expensive computer And you must be careful to never let the guard see you, or you will regret it!

*NOTE* YOU CAN INTERACT  WITH OBJECTS  ONLY  WHEN THE CROSSHAIR GOES RED!

School asset : https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/school-assets-146253

Flashlight asset : https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/tools/survival-game-tools-139872
